United States social distancing policies for COVID-19

Source: R/us_state_distancing_policy.R
us_state_distancing_policy.Rd

An updated, curated set of social distancing and non-pharmaceutical interventions for states in the United States and District of Columbia.

us_state_distancing_policy()

Source

  • https://github.com/COVID19StatePolicy/SocialDistancing/

Kudos

  • Joe Wasserman: http://www.joewasserman.com/

See also

Other data-import: apple_mobility_data(), beoutbreakprepared_data(), cdc_aggregated_projections(), cdc_excess_deaths(), coronanet_government_response_data(), cov_glue_lineage_data(), cov_glue_newick_data(), covidtracker_data(), descartes_mobility_data(), ecdc_data(), eu_data_cache_data(), google_mobility_data(), government_policy_timeline(), healthdata_projections_data(), jhu_data(), jhu_us_data(), kff_icu_beds(), nytimes_county_data(), param_estimates_published(), us_county_geo_details(), us_county_health_rankings(), us_healthcare_capacity(), us_hospital_details(), usa_facts_data()

Examples

res = us_state_distancing_policy()
#> Warning: download failed
#>   web resource path: ‘https://raw.githubusercontent.com/COVID19StatePolicy/SocialDistancing/master/data/USstatesCov19distancingpolicyBETA.csv’
#>   local file path: ‘/Users/sdavis2/Library/Caches/sars2pack/file8f0a525bf2a8’
#>   reason: Not Found (HTTP 404).
#> Warning: bfcdownload() failed
#>   rid: BFC43
#>   file: ‘https://raw.githubusercontent.com/COVID19StatePolicy/SocialDistancing/master/data/USstatesCov19distancingpolicyBETA.csv’
#>   reason: download failed
#> Error: download failed; see warnings()
